title: Scicluna Says ECB Can Cope With Downside Risks and Rate on Hold
summary: The European Central Bank’s interest rates are “fine where they are,” even when considering downside risks to the economy and an inflation forecast slightly below the 2% target in 2027, Governing Council member Edward Scicluna said.

title: The Past, Present and Future of Argentina and the US Innovation Ecosystem
summary: Javier Milei came to the presidency of Argentina promising fundamental economic reform.

title: Italy Budget Gap May Fall Below 3% This Year, Giorgetti Says
summary: Italy’s budget shortfall may fall below 3% of output already this year, allowing it to leave fiscal shackles imposed by the European Union sooner than thought, according to Finance Minister Giancarlo Giorgetti.

title: EU Weighs Trade Measures Aimed at Russian Druzhba Pipeline Oil
summary: The European Union is considering trade measures to target its remaining Russian oil imports, according to people familiar with the matter.

title: India Mulls Strategic Rare Earth Reserve, Defense Official Says
summary: India is considering setting up a strategic reserve of critical minerals for emergency use in defense manufacturing, a top official said, joining other countries who are accelerating efforts to build a domestic supply chain.
